name: Acrobatics
desc: You nimbly dart about, covering ground at every opportunity.
trigger: A _Phase_ starts.
boost:
Choose any:
* 1 _Reflex_: You may _Jump_ once as a part of this Movement.
* 1 _Reflex_: Trigger is instead 'A _Turn_ starts.'

name: Active Defense
desc: Your body is a living weapon, lashing out when foes' attempt to strike.
trigger: You would be attacked by an adjacent creature.
effect: Gain _Vulnerable_ 1 (1 _Focus_). Use _Martial Arts_ against the Triggering Target. Resolve this Attack before the Triggering Attack occurs.

name: Armored Dodge
desc: You make use of your mobility and armor simultaneously, providing a flexible defense.
trigger: You are Attacked.
effect: If you paid more _Grit_ than _Reflex_, gain 1 Guard against the Attack and reduce the _Grit_ cost to _Negate_ by 1. If you paid more _Reflex_ than _Grit_, reduce the Attack Roll by 1 and reduce the _Reflex_ cost to _Negate_ by 1. Otherwise, select either option.
boost:
Choose any:
* 2 _Grit_/_Momentum_: Repeat the _Grit_ effect. You may repeat this Boost.
* 2 _Momentum_/_Reflex_: Repeat the _Reflex_ effect. You may repeat this Boost.

name: Armored Shell
desc: You trust fully in armor, risking damage to better block an attack.
trigger: You would be Attacked.
effect: Increase your _Guard_ by 2 against the Triggering Attack, and reduce the _Grit_ cost to _Negate_ by 1. If this Attack would deal damage equal to or greater than your Armor's _Durability_ gain _Shred_ 1.

name: Blade Counter
desc: You expertly deflect with your blade and seize any opening.
trigger: You are Attacked by a creature you targeted with _Guarded Edge Style_.
effect: Reduce the Attack Roll by 2. If this makes the Attack a _Graze_- you may inflict Damage on the creature as if you rolled a 7 so long as they are within Range of your Weapon.

name: Bristling Quill
desc: As a foe enters the reach of your spear you reinforce how foolhardy an idea that is.
trigger: A creature enters your _Reach_.
effect: The triggering target gains _Hobbled_ 1 (2 _Reflex_). Instead of applying this to the creature's next Movement it is instead applied to their current Movement, even if that Movement is already affected by _Hobbled_. The target may _Negate_ for no cost by allowing you to immediately make an _Armed Strike_ against them with the triggering Lance Weapon.

name: Charge Killer
desc: As a foe enters the reach of your spear you let loose with a mighty attack.
trigger: A creature enters your Lance's _Reach_.
effect: Use the _Armed Strike_ Technique, using your _Lance_ Weapon. On a _Graze_+, deal additional _Damage_ equal to your _Reach_.

name: Chip Damage
desc: When foes strike your armor vicious bits of shrapnel punish their efforts.
trigger: You take damage while you have _Stone Armor_ and are using _Colossus Stance_.
effect: Attack in a _Burst_ 1 with the following Profile.

name: Counter
desc: You sacrifice your defense and capitalize on an opportunity to attack.
trigger: You are Attacked by an adjacent enemy.
effect: Increase the Attack Roll by 2. Immediately Attack the triggering enemy with a 1 AP Single-Target Attack, paying all Costs as normal.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Instead, use a 2 AP Single-Target Strike.

name: Deflect
desc: You block an attack, either with a weapon or your armor.
trigger: You are Attacked.
effect: Increase your _Guard_ by 1 against the Attack and reduce the _Grit_ cost to _Negate_ by 1.
boost: 2 _Grit_: Repeat the Effect. This Boost is repeatable.

name: Destructive Backswing
desc: Your swing of your blunt weapon is never truly over, allowing you to turn a miss into an advantage.
trigger: You _Graze_- with an Attack using a Blunt Weapon.
effect:
Move 1, then choose one:
* Repeat the Attack against an _Obstacle_ in Range.
* Inflict Vulnerable 2 (2 _Reflex_) on the original Target.
boost: 1 _Grit_/_Momentum_: Resolve both Effects.

name: Dodge
desc: You evade a blow, dashing your body enough to lessen the impact.
trigger: You are Attacked.
effect: Reduce the Attack Roll and _Reflex_ cost to _Negate_ by 1.
boost: 2 _Reflex_: Repeat the Effect. This Boost is repeatable.

name: Dodge Roll
trigger: You would be Attacked.
effect: Resolve your Movement. The Attacker may continue moving but, if they cannot place you within range of the Attack, the Attacker must either choose a new Target within Range or lose the Attack. If you are still the target of the Attack, reduce the Attack Roll by 1.
boost: 2 _Reflex_: Move is instead Reposition.

name: Earthen Shield
desc: A wall of stone rises up, shielding you from an incoming assault.
trigger: You or an allied creature within Range 3 is Attacked with on _Earthen_ Terrain while you are using _Barricade Stance_.
effect: Grant the triggering creature _Cover_ and 1 _Guard_ against the triggering Attack. Then _Slide_ 1 the Triggering creature and put an _Earth Platform_ in their space.

name: Evasion
desc: You dive out of the way of an incoming assault, lessening the impact.
trigger: You are Attacked by a damaging Area Effect or _Hazard_.
effect: Resolve your Movement. If this Movement takes out out of the Area, treat the Attack as if it was _Glancing_ against you. Otherwise, reduce the Attack Roll by 1.
boost: 1 _Reflex_: You may instead take a _Reposition_ Move.

name: Expose Flaw
desc: You use your seismic sense to reveal a flaw in a foe's defenses, opening them to attack.
trigger: You or an ally would Attack a creature within your _Seismic Sense_ or Range 8 while you are using _Flawfinder Stance_.
effect: Remove one of your _Knowledge_ Tokens from the Target of the Attack. The foe must Negate with 2 _Focus_, or you add _Unblockable_/_Sure Hit_ X to the Attack, where X is the Value of the _Knowledge_ Token - 1. If the foe is within your _Seismic Sense_, also inflict _Exposed_ X+1 before the Attack resolves.

name: Heavy Guard
desc: You raise your guard temporarily, preparing for an assault.
trigger: A _Phase_ begins.
effect: Gain _Fortify_ 1 until the end of this _Phase_.

name: Heavy Rebuke
desc: You slam forward into a foe as their blow slides off your armor, shoving them back.
trigger: A _Melee_ _Strike_ is a _Graze_- against you or deals 0 Damage.
effect: Deal Damage to the creature equal to your _Armor's_ _Guard_ and inflict _Push_ 1, _Exposed_ 2 (2 _Grit_/_Focus_). If the creature _Negates_ they take half Damage.

name: Heroic Exchange
desc: Your duel is a flurry of blows, inspiring your comrades.
reqs: You are engaged in a Heroic Duel.
trigger: You are Attacked by your Duel Partner.
effect: Increase the Damage of the Attack by your opponent's topmost _Courage_ Token. Immediately Attack the triggering enemy with a 2 AP Single-Target Strike, paying all Costs as normal. On a _Hit_+, grant a creature within Range 6 _Courage_ 1.

name: Heroic Stand
desc: You fill an ally in a dire spot with courage to keep them in the battle.
trigger: An ally within Range of _Hearts of Stone_ takes Damage or would gain _Fear_.
effect: Grant the ally _Courage_ 1, _Vigor_ 2.
boost: 1 _Focus_/_Momentum_: Instead, grant _Courage_ 2, _Vigor_ 4.

name: Hidden Flaw
desc: As a foe slams into an obstacle you subtly shift it, maximizing the harm.
trigger: A creature within an Area created by _Rippling View_ is forcibly moved into an _Obstacle_.
effect: The creature takes 2 _True_ Damage and gains _Dazed_ 2/_Wounded_ 1 (2 _Focus_/_Grit_).

name: Immovable Object
desc: You draw upon the strength of the earth, rendering you immovable for an instant.
trigger: You are Attacked.
effect: Gain _Slowed_. Immediately use _Deflect_, ignoring its usual _Cost_. If you would be _Pushed_, _Pulled_, or _Slid_, you are instead not.

name: Invincible
desc: Your armor is an impregnable bastion, striking fear into the hearts of foes.
trigger: A creature deals 0 Damage to you with a _Strike_.
effect: Inflict _Fear_ 1 (1 _Focus_) on the creature, and reduce your cost to _Negate_ by 1.

name: Lightning Reflexes
desc: You flawlessly avoid a creature's attempt to punish you.
trigger: A creature would make an _Opportune_ _Punish_ Attack against you.
effect: Resolve the Attack by rolling only a single d6.
boost: 1 _Reflex_: Instead, Trigger is 'A creature would make a _Punish_ Attack against you.'

name: Lionheart Shield
desc: You become a shining example of courage, leaping in front of an attack that would harm a friend.
trigger: An adjacent ally is successfully Attacked while you are in _Bold Stance_.
effect: Move into the target's space, _Pushing_ them 1. You become the Target of the original Attack. If this was an Area attack your ally is only exempt if they are _Pushed_ out of the Area. Gain 1 _Courage_.
special: You may pay any amount of the Cost by expending an equivalent Value of _Courage_, using any Tokens.
boost:
Choose any:
* 1 _Reflex_: Trigger is instead 'An ally within Step distance is Attacked.'
* 1 _Grit_: You may _Push_ your ally an additional 1. You may use this _Boost_ multiple times.

name: Opportunity Attack
desc: You capitalize on the opening created by a repositioning foe, moving to strike while you can.
trigger: An enemy starts a _Shift_ while within your _Reach_ or while in an adjacent space.
effect: Immediately Attack the triggering enemy with a 1 AP Single-Target Attack. If this triggers based on your _Reach_, you must make a Weapon Strike using the triggering Weapon (and pay the applicable Boost). If this triggers based on an adjacent space, instead Attack with any Single-Target Technique.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Instead, use a 2 AP Strike.

name: Overwatch
desc: You hone in your aim on an area, preparing to loose on any that linger too long.
trigger: A creature within your Weapon Range ends their Turn in the Hazard created by _Overwatch Style_ or Moves into the Hazard.
effect: Make a 2 AP _Glancing_ _Armed Strike_ with a Projectile Weapon against the Triggering creature.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Remove _Glancing_.

name: Palm Throw
desc: With a flick of your wrist you fling a weapon, catching foes unaware.
trigger: A _Phase_ Begins.
effect: Attack using a _Thrown_ Weapon that you have _Equipped_ or _Wielded_. If that creature has not taken a Turn this Round increase the cost to Negate by 1.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Remove _Glancing_.

name: Patient Guard
desc: Your counter is delayed, instead positioning yourself to exploit an opening.
trigger: You are Attacked while wearing Light _Armor_.
effect: Increase the Attack Roll by 1. Gain 1 _Momentum_, and the opponent must either pay 1 _Focus_ or else you gain a +1 Bonus to your next Attack Roll against them.
boost: 1 _Focus_/_Momentum_: Instead, foe must pay 2 _Focus_ or else you gain a +1 Bonus and add _Sure Hit_/_Unblockable_ 2 to your next Attack Roll against them.

name: Perfect Counter
desc: You punish an opening, exploiting it as much as possible.
trigger: You are Attacked while wearing Light _Armor_.
effect: Immediately Attack the triggering enemy with a 1 AP Single-Target Strike, paying all Costs as normal. Deal an additional 2 Damage on a _Graze_+.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Instead, use a 2 AP Strike.

name: Pinpoint Location
desc: You read a foe's movements and prepare to launch a devastating assault.
trigger: A creature within your _Seismic Sense_ starts their _Turn_, you have no _Hazards_ created by this _Reaction_, have played _Earthen Eyes_ this _Round_, and are _Blinded_.
effect: At the end of the creature's _Turn_ create a Size 1 _Hazard_ in their space. At the start of the next _Phase_, after resolving any 'A _Phase_ starts' _Reactions_, use any 2 AP, Single-Target Technique against the creature if it is still in the _Hazard_.
special: If an ally attacks the Target while they are within the _Hazard_, you may remove the _Hazard_ to grant them _Advantage_ on the Attack.
boost: 1 _Reflex_: You may use the _Techniques_' Movement, if any.

name: Punishing Bash
desc: You lash out with your shield, defending an ally when a foe dares to strike them.
trigger: An adjacent enemy Attacks a creature other than you.
effect: Make a 1 AP Weapon Strike using your Shield against the triggering enemy. Apply _Impaired_ before resolving the triggering Attack.

name: Read the Pulse
desc: Your seismic sense reveals an upcoming attack, allowing you to take action before it lands.
trigger: You are Attacked by a creature within your _Seismic Sense_ while using _Pulsereader Stance_.
effect: You may immediately use the _Deflect_ or _Dodge_ Reaction. Pay all normal Costs, but you may use _Focus_ in place of _Reflex_ or _Grit_. If this causes the Attack to deal no _Damage_ or _Miss_, inflict _Knowledge_ 1 (1 _Focus_).

name: Reorient
desc: You swiftly move, adjusting your footing before taking a more serious action.
trigger: A _Phase_ begins while you are not _Prone_.
boost: 1 _Momentum_/_Reflex_: Add _Safe_ 1.

name: Retrieve
desc: You grab an unattended item.
trigger: Your _Turn_ starts or ends or you move adjacent to an unattended piece of _Equipment_ while you are not _Disarmed_.
effect: _Equip_ or _Wield_ (if you have the appropriate _Open Hands_) a single unattended, adjacent piece of _Equipment_. Before _Wielding_ an item, you may choose to stop _Wielding_ _Equipment_ of your choice, placing them unattended in your current or adjacent spaces.

name: Reverberations
desc: Attacks create vibrations, ones that you use to glean more information.
trigger: A foe is _Hit_+ or knocked _Prone_ within your _Seismic Sense_ and you have played _Amplify Pulse_ this _Round_.
effect: Inflict _Knowledge_ 1 (1 _Focus_). If the foe is knocked _Prone_  or _Defeated_ as a part of the Trigger, instead either inflict _Knowledge_ 1 (1 _Focus_) in a _Burst_ 1 around the Target, or _Knowledge_ 2 (2 _Focus_) on the Target.

name: Rollout
desc: You swiftly move a boulder into a creature, slamming them backwards with force.
trigger: A creature enters a space adjacent to a _Boulder_ within Range 6 while you are using _Avalanche Stance_.
effect: Deal 4 _Crush_ Damage to the triggering creature and _Push_ 2 (2 _Grit_/_Reflex_). If they Negate, they take no Damage. If you _Push_ the Target, move the _Boulder_ so it is still adjacent to the Target.

name: Sacrificial Shield
desc: You haphazardously throw up your shield, risking your shield to defend.
trigger: You are Attacked by the creature targeted by _Raise Guard_.
effect: Resolve the Attack against your Shield, other than yourself. Gain _Impaired_ 1.

name: Sample Reaction
desc: A sample Reaction to outline the different fields.
move: If the Reaction provides any Movement, it goes here.
cost: What must be paid to use this Reaction.
reqs: What requirements you must fulfill to use this Reaction.
trigger: The triggering condition to use this Reaction.
effect: The primary effect of this Reaction.
boost: An optional effect with an associated cost that can be paid when the Reaction is used.

name: Seismic Scouting
desc: You almost passively acquire knowledge on foes, creating an easy path to defeat them.
trigger: A foe ends their _Turn_ within your _Seismic Sense_ while you are using _Sonar Stance_.
effect: Inflict _Knowledge_ 1 (1 _Focus_). If they do not _Negate_, you may instead increase the value of your topmost _Knowledge_ Token on the creature by 1.
boost: 1 _Focus_: Add _Efficient_.

name: Sentry's Throw
desc: You swiftly fling a weapon at a creature who dares to attack a foe, potentially catching them off-guard.
trigger: A creature within Range of a _Thrown_ Weapon you have _Equipped_ would Attack an ally.
effect: The Target chooses: Either they reduce their Attack Roll by 2 and you make a single _Glancing_ Attack against them, or they resolve their Attack with no penalty and you make a single Attack against them. This Attack must use the Ranged Weapon who's Range Triggered this Reaction.

name: Severing Jab
desc: You lash out as another creature attempts to make use of spiritual techniques, potentially disrupting the ability.
trigger: An adjacent creature uses a _Spirit_ Technique.
effect: _Wager_ up to 3 _Focus_ against the Triggering creature. If you win, they take a Penalty equal to your _Wager_ on the Attack Roll. If you lose, gain _Exposed_ 1.

name: Shield Block
desc: You block with your shield, providing an unparalled defense.
trigger: You are attacked.
effect: Increase your _Guard_ by 1 and gain _Full Cover_ against the triggering Attack.
boost: 2 _Grit_: Increase your _Guard_ by 1 more. This Boost is repeatable.

name: Shrug Off
desc: Rather than dodging, you rely on your heavy armor to stop all ills.
trigger: You would gain a Standard or Elemental _Affliction_.
effect: You may pay the cost to _Negate_ the triggering _Affliction_ using _Grit_. If it already cost _Grit_, reduce the cost to _Negate_ by 2.

name: Skilled Sculptor
desc: You swiftly shape the ground around you, molding it like clay to better suit your purpose.
trigger: A _Phase_ begins while you are using _Sculptor Stance_.
effect: Repeat the Effect of _Sculptor Stance_.

name: Stone Block
desc: Your mighty shield of floating stone intercepts an attack, making it far easier to defend against.
trigger: A creature adjacent to one of the _Boulder_s created by _Stone Shield_ would be attacked.
effect: Grant the creature 2 _Fleeting_ _Grit_. You may choose to Destroy one of the _Boulders_ as a part of this Reaction to immediately grant the Target _Stone Armor_ 1 and one additional _Fleeting_ _Grit_.

name: Swift Punishment
desc: None near you are safe from your punishment.
trigger: A creature enters a space within _Step_ Movement of you.
effect: Resolve this _Technique's_ Move. Immediately Attack the triggering creature with a 1 AP Single-Target Attack, paying all Costs as normal.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Instead, use a 2 AP Single-Target Strike.

name: Tremors
desc: You focus, expanding the area of your tremors for a moment.
trigger: A _Phase_ begins while you are using _Roiling Stance_.
effect: Replace 'adjacent to you' in _Roiling Stance_ with 'within Range 2' until the end of the _Phase_.

name: True Grit
desc: As long as your heart is filled with courage, you cannot fall.
trigger: You are _Attacked_ or your _Turn_ begins while under the effect of _Last Stand_.
effect: Gain 1 _Guard_ this Turn. Remove your topmost _Courage_ Token. Gain X _Fleeting_ _Grit_, where X is the _Courage_ Token's Value. You may, instead of paying the _Grit_ cost of this Reaction, use it by decreasing the value of your topmost _Courage_ Token by 1 or removing a _Courage_ Token.

name: Valor's Cry
desc: As you defeat a foe you let out a victorious cry, lifting the spirits of your allies.
trigger: You _Defeat_ a foe while using _Inspiring Stance_.
effect: Grant an allied creature within Range 6 _Courage_ 1, _Vigor_ 2.
boost:
Choose one:
* 1 _Focus_/_Momentum_: Instead, grant _Courage_ 2, _Vigor_ 4.
* 1 _Focus_/_Momentum_: Instead, grant all allies in a Burst 4 _Courage_ 1, _Vigor_ 2.

name: Vigilant Defender
desc: You cover an aly with your shield, protecting them from harm.
trigger: An adjacent ally is attacked.
effect: Use any _Block_ Reaction you have against the triggering attack, granting your ally all effects. Any bonuses to the _Block_ granted by your _Stance_ or _Techniques_ you have used apply. Additionally, the Target gains an additional 1 _Guard_ and reduces the _Grit_ cost to _Negate_ by 1.

name: Whirling Counter
desc: You absorb the momentum of an attack, using it to launch you to attack another.
trigger: You are Attacked while wearing Light _Armor_.
effect: Increase the Attack Roll by 2. Use this Technique's _Move_, then immediately Attack any creature other than the Triggering Target with a 1 AP Single-Target Strike, paying all Costs as normal.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Instead, use a 2 AP Strike.

name: Wide Guard
desc: Your shield protects all nearby, warding against all harm.
trigger: You or an adjacent ally are hit with an Area of Effect attack.
effect: Use the _Shield Block_ Reaction for no Cost, granting the benefits to you and all adjacent allies.
boost:
1 _Grit_: If the Attack passed through or originated in the Arc created by _Iron Wall_, gain a benefit depending on the Area of the Triggering attack.
* _Line_: The Attack gains _Glancing_ for all targets in spaces past your own.
* _Cone_, _Blast_, or _Burst_: This Attack is _Glancing_ against allies in the adjacent spaces that are not a part of Iron Wall's Arc.

name: Nip
desc: You lunge at a foe as an ally attacks.
trigger: An ally attacks an adjacent foe.
effect: Use _Armed Strike_ with a _Bite_ Weapon against the foe.
